text: @seanhannity HELP: POST FROM DAUGHTER IN HOSPITALISOLATIONSINCESATURDAY MARKED (PUI)I said my only dx is pericarditis so cardio should be considered my primary doc and called first. She said if marked as PUI covid19 then That is my main dx, according to policy.Covid test taken Saturday night
